title: The Schoolmaster
brief_description: A portrait of a young schoolmaster who teachesz in a small country town in the Scottish hills. The film describes his home, his work, his relations with his pupils and their parents, and the affection and respect with which he is regarded. This film gives a intimate picture of the workings and atmosphere of a typical; school in Britain in a setting of traditional Scottish countryside.
